query:
ALTER TABLE learner_badges 
  ADD COLUMN `titleFr` varchar(100) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `description` varchar(255) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `descriptionFr` varchar(255) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `iconUrl` varchar(500) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `courseId` int(11) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `moduleId` int(11) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `metadata` json NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `awardedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  ADD COLUMN `isNew` boolean DEFAULT true;

  ADD COLUMN `titleFr` varchar(100) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `description` varchar(255) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `descriptionFr` varchar(255) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `iconUrl` varchar(500) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `courseId` int(11) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `moduleId` int(11) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `metadata` json NULL,
  ADD COLUMN `awardedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  ADD COLUMN `isNew` boolean DEFAULT true;
